checkers
Class AI

java.lang.Object
  checkers.AI

public class AI
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a computer "AI" to play against the player. This class packages all functions of a computer player.

Method Detail

getNextMove

public void getNextMove()
Makes the next move by moving a piece in the grid given on construction Evaluates all possible moves and makes the one it deems to be most "correct"

pickMove

public Move pickMove()
Subset of getNextMove() , This method gets the move to be made next, but doesn't make it.

Returns:
Move to be made

recurse

public void recurse(Node<Move,Grid> root,
                    int depth)
Recurses through all possible moves to the depth given. The color it starts off with is the opposite of the color given in the root object.

Parameters:
root - Root node for things to be attached to.
depth - How far you want it to go.

evaluateMoves

public Move evaluateMoves(Node<Move,Grid> root)
Evaluates all moves in the given node, and returns the one that gets the higest ranking from rankMove()

Parameters:
root - Root node from which to rank
Returns:
Move that receives highest score that is a child of root node.

Assigns a number to this board state based on criteria.

Parameters:
ranked -
multiplier - positive if calculating AI, negative for player
Returns:
a double of the rank of this Move.

arrayToString
